name: Nullstar.io
description:
Nullstar.io brings asteroids style gameplay to a large slither.io style world.

This Itch.io demo is a single-player practice mode vs AI on a small map.

Full game is free to play online at http://nullstar.io in any desktop browser. No registration. No downloads.

Currently in open Beta: 

  • No ads. 
  • Limited to 80 players simultaneously.
